description: 'Kuol poised for new loan deal from Newcastle'
title: 'Kuol poised for new loan deal from Newcastle'
title_page: 'Kuol poised for new loan deal from Newcastle' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Garang Kuol is set for another loan move away from Newcastle United to an unnamed club with the 18-year-old Australia forward, who was with Heart of Midlothian last season, yet to feature for the Magpies in their pre-season campaign. (Chronicle Live), external
Read Wednesday's Scottish Gossip in full here.
